forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. North northeast wind 14 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
Tonight in Downtown San Francisco greets you with a veil of partly cloudy skies, a gentle reminder of the winter chill settling into the air, as temperatures hover around the low 50s. An invigorating north-northeast wind whispers through the streets, making its presence known with brisk gusts, urging you to wrap up warmly if venturing outdoors. As night deepens, expect a slight rise in warmth, providing a hint of comfort against the coolness that lingers.

Tomorrow paints a different picture, with bright sunshine promising to illuminate the cityscape. A peak at the sky reveals a serene clarity, ensuring stunning views across the bay and toward the iconic Golden Gate Bridge. Temperatures will flirt with the low 60s, dipping to the mid-50s in the afternoon, inviting a day of exploration and light-hearted activities. Layering is key; perhaps a stylish sweater paired with a light jacket would suit the transition from the cool morning into a sunnier afternoon. It is an ideal time for a casual stroll along Embarcadero or a leisurely coffee break at a quaint café while absorbing the vibrant rhythm of city life. Enjoy the enchanting interplay of light and shadow that San Francisco offers in this tranquil season.
